title: Day 1062
content:
# Day 1062

_"I love you, Dada."_

I hope every man reading this gets to hear those words one day, especially if you have a daughter. I never knew my heart could melt so completely, but the moment my little girl said it, I felt it turn to liquid. And then she smiled like the universe had just handed me its greatest gift.

It is amazing what a dad will do for his daughter. She reads me like a book, knows exactly how to pull me back in. And yet, even knowing this, when she starts to cry because _"Daddy has to do some work,"_ I still find myself right back beside her, tucking her in, whispering stories, watching her drift off to sleep. The work can wait.

I wouldn't trade these moments for anything in the world. I am so unbelievably blessed.

I love you, Sloan. No words will ever be enough to capture how lucky I feel or just how much love I have for you.

2/16/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
